title: Orange Walk People's Stadium
text:
Orange Walk People's Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Orange%20Walk%20District">Orange Walk</a>, <a href="Belize">Belize</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and was the home stadium to <a href="Juventus%20%28Belize%29">Juventus</a> in the <a href="Belize%20Premier%20Football%20League">Belize Premier Football League</a> of the <a href="Football%20Federation%20of%20Belize">Football Federation of Belize</a> as well as horse racing. Before 2011, it also served as the home stadium to <a href="San%20Felipe%20Barcelona">San Felipe Barcelona</a>, also in BPFL.
The stadium holds 4,500 people.
